summary: A PyTorch Lightning example that implements a simple MNIST classifier and offers a command‑line interface to train, validate, and test the model on Habana Gaudi HPUs, utilizing the HPU precision plugin and the standard MNIST data module.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to leverage Habana Gaudi HPUs within a PyTorch Lightning workflow for fast, low‑precision training of a common computer‑vision benchmark, helping developers adopt HPU acceleration in their own deep‑learning projects.
